full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MGON PO'I BSNYEN BSGRUB LAS GSUM GYI LAS BSGRIGS CHEN MO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @031A *, ,YE SHES KYI MGON PO 'DI NYID BYIN RLABS SHIN TU MYUR BAR GRAGS SHING GSOL BA 'DEBS PA DANG, GTOR MA RE TZAM 'BUL BA MANG BAR SNANG LA'NAG, PHAL CHER BSNYEN SGRUB LAS GSUM GYI RNAM BZHAG 'CHAD PA NYUNG BAR SNANG ZHING MI MKHAS PAS BCOS MAR SBYAR BA'I LTAD MANG BA DANG, MAN NGAG GNAD DANG LDAN PA NYUNG BAR MTHONG NAS RNAM BZHAG GSAL BAR PHYE BA'I KHRIGS SU SDEBS PA'I YI GE 'DI NYID, RDO RJE 'DZIN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG PO NYE BAR SBYAR BA'I DGE BAS 'GRO BA MA LUS PA BDUD BZHI'I DGRA LAS RGYAL BAR GYUR cIG , MANGGA LAm,, ,,
